mapper.select: SELECT r.RESOURCE_NAME, r.RESOURCE_URI, r.RESOURCE_METHOD, r.RESOURCE_CODE, CASE WHEN p.ENABLED = 0 THEN 8 WHEN p.PERM_LEVEL IS NOT NULL THEN p.PERM_LEVEL ELSE r.RESOURCE_LEVEL END AS RESOURCE_LEVEL FROM resource r LEFT JOIN permission p ON p.DELETED = 0 AND p.PERM_CODE = r.RESOURCE_CODE WHERE r.RESOURCE_URI = #{requestUri} AND r.RESOURCE_METHOD IN (#{requestMethod}, '*')
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO resource (RESOURCE_NAME, RESOURCE_URI, RESOURCE_METHOD, RESOURCE_CODE, RESOURCE_LEVEL) VALUES
(#{resource.resourceName}, #{resource.resourceUri}, #{resource.resourceMethod}, #{resource.resourceCode}, #{resource.resourceLevel})
